author: dildick
body:
#### PR description:

With this PR we add histograms for CSC trigger primitives (ALCT, CLCT, LCT) data vs emulator comparisons. There are 1D histograms for each TP property and "data-emulator" plots - which ideally are empty. 

It would be great to have this up and running for the next MWGR.

#### PR validation:

Tested by @akhter-towsifa with a DQM private server (on an lxplus machine) using MWGR#5(2020) data. See also https://indico.cern.ch/event/1012264/contributions/4249723/attachments/2197001/3714846/Akhter_02252021_GEM_CSC_DQM_GUI_lxplus711.pdf

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

May need to backport to 11_2 for MWGR.

FYI @akhter-towsifa @ptcox @tahuang1991
title: Data vs emulator plots in CSC DQM [11_3_X]
